Articles.Content: Banned because we need more...... Lights?

(Request for lock? This is going on tooooo long!
Banned because that's not how this game is played

Banned because that's not how this game is played

It's not that, It's just that it is getting toooooo BIG!

Banned because there's a last page button.

(really, a long thread shouldn't be an issue, speaking from experience most forums prefer having a long thread to having two smaller threads)

Banned because there's a last page button.

(really, a long thread shouldn't be an issue, speaking from experience most forums prefer having a long thread to having two smaller threads)

It's getting out of control
Banned for wanting to control it.

Banned for wanting to control it.

I mean, it's being necroed constantly, It has gone on long enough, I just don't want you to get attached to this! Plus, I think it's about time it would be locked. All I'm saying is that it needs to be locked because it is constantly being resurrected.
Banned for implying that 1000+ page threads can be controlled.

Banned for implying that 1000+ page threads can be controlled.

It's time to give this game a break, It's getting out of hand, That's all I am saying,
So KerbinW365, how about you skipping this thread as a simpler solution? And everybody else, please stick to the rules and get back to the game, by banning me for some cobbled up reason.
Banned for not locking the thread.
Banned for telling a moderator what to do.
Banned for only having 2 lightning bug splats under your user title windshield.
Banned because aliens abducted my prune juice and sniped my snail fluids.
Banned for not telling the press.
Told for not pressing the ban.

Banned for having more rep than me, while also being far younger than me. Seriously, I never realized that you only joined last year!

And good to see that you followed my advice of throwing something out to improve the TWR of your former rocket avatar! With a spin like that, it sure must have been violent. Poor Kerbal.
